verses.verse: Then they told <WH5046> <WH8686> David <WH1732>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold, the Philistines <WH6430> fight <WH3898> <WH8737> against Keilah <WH7084>, and they rob <WH8154> <WH8802> the threshingfloors <WH1637>.

Therefore David <WH1732> enquired <WH7592> <WH8799> of the YY <WH3068>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Shall I go <WH3212> <WH8799> and smite <WH5221> <WH8689> these Philistines <WH6430>? And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto David <WH1732>, Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, and smite <WH5221> <WH8689> the Philistines <WH6430>, and save <WH3467> <WH8689> Keilah <WH7084>.

And David's <WH1732> men <WH582> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Behold, we be afraid <WH3373> here in Y'hudah <WH3063>: how much more then if we come <WH3212> <WH8799> to Keilah <WH7084> against the armies <WH4634> of the Philistines <WH6430> ?

Then David <WH1732> enquired <WH7592> <WH8800> of the YY <WH3068> yet again <WH3254> <WH8686>. And the YY <WH3068> answered <WH6030> <WH8799> him and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Arise <WH6965> <WH8798>, go down <WH3381> <WH8798> to Keilah <WH7084>; for I will deliver <WH5414> <WH8802> the Philistines <WH6430> into thine hand <WH3027>.

So David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> went <WH3212> <WH8799> to Keilah <WH7084>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> with the Philistines <WH6430>, and brought away <WH5090> <WH8799> their cattle <WH4735>, and smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them with a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>. So David <WH1732> saved <WH3467> <WH8686> the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Keilah <WH7084>.

And it came to pass, when Evyatar <WH54> the son <WH1121> of Ahimelech <WH288> fled <WH1272> <WH8800> to David <WH1732> to Keilah <WH7084>, that he came down <WH3381> <WH8804> with an ephod <WH646> in his hand <WH3027>.

And it was told <WH5046> <WH8714> Saul <WH7586> that David <WH1732> was come <WH935> <WH8804> to Keilah <WH7084>. And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799>, 'Elohim <WH430> hath delivered <WH5234> <WH8765> him into mine hand <WH3027>; for he is shut in <WH5462> <WH8738>, by entering <WH935> <WH8800> into a town <WH5892> that hath gates <WH1817> and bars <WH1280>.

And Saul <WH7586> called <WH8085> all the people <WH5971> together <WH8085> <WH8762> to war <WH4421>, to go down <WH3381> <WH8800> to Keilah <WH7084>, to besiege <WH6696> <WH8800> David <WH1732> and his men <WH582>.

And David <WH1732> knew <WH3045> <WH8799> that Saul <WH7586> secretly practised <WH2790> <WH8688> mischief <WH7451> against him; and he said <WH559> <WH8799> to Evyatar <WH54> the Kohen <WH3548>, Bring hither <WH5066> <WH8685> the ephod <WH646>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> David <WH1732>, O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, thy servant <WH5650> hath certainly <WH8085> <WH8800> heard <WH8085> <WH8804> that Saul <WH7586> seeketh <WH1245> <WH8764> to come <WH935> <WH8800> to Keilah <WH7084>, to destroy <WH7843> <WH8763> the city <WH5892> for my sake.

Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> deliver me up <WH5462> <WH8686> into his hand <WH3027>? will Saul <WH7586> come down <WH3381> <WH8799>, as thy servant <WH5650> hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804>? O YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, I beseech thee, tell <WH5046> <WH8685> thy servant <WH5650>. And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, He will come down <WH3381> <WH8799>.

Then said <WH559> <WH8799> David <WH1732>, Will the men <WH1167> of Keilah <WH7084> deliver <WH5462> <WH8686> me and my men <WH582> into the hand <WH3027> of Saul <WH7586>? And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799>, They will deliver thee up <WH5462> <WH8686>.

Then David <WH1732> and his men <WH582>, which were about six <WH8337> hundred <WH3967> <WH376>, arose <WH6965> <WH8799> and departed <WH3318> <WH8799> out of Keilah <WH7084>, and went <WH1980> <WH8691> whithersoever <WH834> they could go <WH1980> <WH8691>. And it was told <WH5046> <WH8717> Saul <WH7586> that David <WH1732> was escaped <WH4422> <WH8738> from Keilah <WH7084>; and he forbare <WH2308> <WH8799> to go forth <WH3318> <WH8800>.

And David <WH1732> abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in the wilderness <WH4057> in strong holds <WH4679>, and remained <WH3427> <WH8799> in a mountain <WH2022> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph <WH2128>. And Saul <WH7586> sought <WH1245> <WH8762> him every day <WH3117>, but 'Elohim <WH430> delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> him not into his hand <WH3027>.

And David <WH1732> saw <WH7200> <WH8799> that Saul <WH7586> was come out <WH3318> <WH8804> to seek <WH1245> <WH8763> his life <WH5315>: and David <WH1732> was in the wilderness <WH4057> of Ziph <WH2128> in a wood <WH2793>.

And Y'honatan <WH3083> Saul's <WH7586> son <WH1121> arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> to David <WH1732> into the wood <WH2793>, and strengthened <WH2388> <WH8762> his hand <WH3027> in 'Elohim <WH430>.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> not: for the hand <WH3027> of Saul <WH7586> my father <WH1> shall not find <WH4672> <WH8799> thee; and thou shalt be king <WH4427> <WH8799> over Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and I shall be next <WH4932> unto thee; and that also Saul <WH7586> my father <WH1> knoweth <WH3045> <WH8802>.

And they two <WH8147> made <WH3772> <WH8799> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>: and David <WH1732> abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in the wood <WH2793>, and Y'honatan <WH3083> went <WH1980> <WH8804> to his house <WH1004>.

Then came up <WH5927> <WH8799> the Ziphites <WH2130> to Saul <WH7586> to Giv`ah <WH1390>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Doth not David <WH1732> hide <WH5641> <WH8693> himself with us in strong holds <WH4679> in the wood <WH2793>, in the hill <WH1389> of Hachilah <WH2444>, which is on the south <WH3225> of Jeshimon <WH3452> ?

Now therefore, O king <WH4428>, come down <WH3381> <WH8798> according to all the desire <WH185> of thy soul <WH5315> to come down <WH3381> <WH8800>; and our part shall be to deliver <WH5462> <WH8687> him into the king's <WH4428> hand <WH3027>.
And Saul <WH7586> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be ye of the YY <WH3068>; for ye have compassion <WH2550> <WH8804> on me.

Go <WH3212> <WH8798>, I pray you, prepare <WH3559> <WH8685> yet, and know <WH3045> <WH8798> and see <WH7200> <WH8798> his place <WH4725> where his haunt <WH7272> is, and who hath seen <WH7200> <WH8804> him there: for it is told <WH559> <WH8804> me that he dealeth very <WH6191> <WH8800> subtilly <WH6191> <WH8686>.

See <WH7200> <WH8798> therefore, and take knowledge <WH3045> <WH8798> of all the lurking places <WH4224> where he hideth <WH2244> <WH8691> himself, and come ye again <WH7725> <WH8804> to me with the certainty <WH3559> <WH8737>, and I will go <WH1980> <WH8804> with you: and it shall come to pass, if he be <WH3426> in the land <WH776>, that I will search <WH2664> <WH8765> him out throughout all the thousands <WH505> of Y'hudah <WH3063>.

And they arose <WH6965> <WH8799>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> to Ziph <WH2128> before <WH6440> Saul <WH7586>: but David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> were in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon <WH4584>, in the plain <WH6160> on the south <WH3225> of Jeshimon <WH3452>.

Saul <WH7586> also and his men <WH582> went <WH3212> <WH8799> to seek <WH1245> <WH8763> him. And they told <WH5046> <WH8686> David <WH1732>: wherefore he came down <WH3381> <WH8799> into a rock <WH5553>, and abode <WH3427> <WH8799> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon <WH4584>. And when Saul <WH7586> heard <WH8085> <WH8799> that, he pursued <WH7291> <WH8799> after <WH310> David <WH1732> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Maon <WH4584>.

And Saul <WH7586> went <WH3212> <WH8799> on this side <WH6654> of the mountain <WH2022>, and David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> on that side <WH6654> of the mountain <WH2022>: and David <WH1732> made haste <WH2648> <WH8737> to get away <WH3212> <WH8800> for fear <WH6440> of Saul <WH7586>; for Saul <WH7586> and his men <WH582> compassed <WH5849> David <WH1732> and his men <WH582> round about <WH5849> <WH8802> to take <WH8610> <WH8800> them.

But there came <WH935> <WH8804> a messenger <WH4397> unto Saul <WH7586>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Haste <WH4116> <WH8761> thee, and come <WH3212> <WH8798>; for the Philistines <WH6430> have invaded <WH6584> <WH8804> the land <WH776>.

Wherefore Saul <WH7586> returned <WH7725> <WH8799> from pursuing <WH7291> <WH8800> after <WH310> David <WH1732>, and went <WH3212> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> the Philistines <WH6430>: therefore they called <WH7121> <WH8804> that place <WH4725> Selahammahlekoth <WH5555>.
And David <WH1732> went up <WH5927> <WH8799> from thence, and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in strong holds <WH4679> at Engedi <WH5872>.
